issue.title: [Release][C#] Use .NET 6.0 on Ubuntu 22.04
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-16176](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-16176). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Ubuntu 22.04 ships OpenSSL 3 and .NET 5.0 or earlier doesn't support
OpenSSL 3 yet.

https://github.com/ursacomputing/crossbow/runs/5991452980?check_suite_focus=true
